settings.label: Desktop logo height
settings.visible_if: {{ settings.logo_glassware != blank or settings.logo_prima != blank or settings.logo_inverse_glassware != blank or settings.logo_inverse_prima != blank }}

name: Swym Wishlist Plus - Custom Element Settings

settings.info: We recommend using the Admin App to configure these settings. [Open App](/admin/apps/swym-relay)

settings.label: Select Position
settings.info: Choose where the wishlist button appears on your product page. Select 'Custom Placement' to manually specify a location using a CSS selector. [Help](https://help.getswym.com/en/articles/13249541-how-to-find-css-selectors-for-custom-button-placement)

settings.label: Custom Placement Selector
settings.info: Enter a CSS selector of the parent element to anchor the button. Only used if Button Position is set to 'Custom' Placement. [Help](https://help.getswym.com/en/articles/13249541-how-to-find-css-selectors-for-custom-button-placement)
We recommend using the Admin App to configure these settings. [Open App](/admin/apps/swym-relay)

settings.label: Add to Wishlist HTML
settings.info: Customize the button's appearance for products not yet saved to the wishlist.

settings.label: Added to Wishlist HTML
settings.info: Customize the button's appearance for products already in the wishlist.

settings.label: Custom Styling (CSS)
settings.info: Modify CSS here to fine-tune the button's design and ensure it matches your theme perfectly.
